Text:
#4 is still the wrong file from a few weeks ago - first 4 pages are covers, rest is issue #1. Its been driving me crazy for weeks - no one seems to have scanned the correction.

I read that they are having a Fiona and Cake Mini-series coming up! :D
I haven't had a chance to read this series yet.  I was preparing to upload #5 and noticed that #4 wasn't uploaded, so I uploaded it (#4) after checking the covers and info page.
NBD - that copy has been floating around and i keep almost uploading it. Cant wait for the correct version. #5 is perfect though
So no one has issue no. 4 yet? As of Nov. 18, it's not available yet.
All the #4 versions I've seen are wrong, still dunno the reason...
